last_episode_to_air.name: Eden
last_episode_to_air.overview: Linden and Holder are confronted with the shocking truth behind the Stansbury murders.

name: The Killing
overview: The Killing is an American crime drama television series based upon the Danish television series Forbrydelsen. Set in Seattle, Washington, the series follows the various murder investigations by homicide detectives Sarah Linden and Stephen Holder.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: A conflicted homicide detective seeking to leave Seattle and start a new life feels compelled to stay and solve the murder of a teenage girl.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: Seattle police detectives Sarah Linden and Stephen Holder continue to track a teenage girl's killer after getting it wrong, with tragic consequences.

seasons.name: Season 3
seasons.overview: Ex-detective Sarah Linden returns to a career she thought she'd left behind when her former partner uncovers a string of murders linked to her past.

seasons.name: Season 4
seasons.overview: Linden and Holder return to probe the brutal murder of a family while confronting their own dark actions in the final season of this crime thriller.

tagline: The past can't be washed away.

episodes.name: Pilot
episodes.overview: On her last day of work, homicide detective Sarah Linden is drawn into a new case about the disappearance of a teenage girl, Rosie Larsen. Mitch and Stan Larsen frantically try to track down their daughter when they learn she did not show up at school. City Councilman Darren Richmond prepares for an important forum with the Mayor as the election nears.

episodes.name: The Cage
episodes.overview: The investigation into Rosie’s killer begins as Sarah and Holder question the missing girl’s parents, Stan and Mitch, as well as Rosie’s friends and City Councilman Richmond. Rosie’s school becomes a potential murder site when Sarah and Holder uncover shocking evidence on campus. Heartbroken and grief-stricken, Mitch and Stan face the aftermath of losing their daughter.

episodes.name: El Diablo
episodes.overview: Councilman Richmond suspects a leak within his team; Sarah tracks down a witness and is led to a suspect.

episodes.name: A Soundless Echo
episodes.overview: Linden and Holder pressure Jasper for answers and interview a new suspect.

episodes.name: Super 8
episodes.overview: Rosie's teacher provides Sarah and Holder with a new piece of evidence. Richmond's campaign team plans a new anti-crime television commercial. Mitch continues to struggle with the loss of her daughter, while Stan becomes more determined to find Rosie's killer, and asks his colleague Belko for help.

episodes.name: What You Have Left
episodes.overview: Sarah and Holder intensify their investigation on a suspect's family and friends. Gwen and Richmond disagree over strategy for the next debate with the mayor. Meanwhile, Rosie's funeral takes place and Stan concentrates on his own investigation into her death.

episodes.name: Vengeance
episodes.overview: Mitch questions the validity of the police investigation while Richmond has to deal with a negative ad. It's discovered that Rosie was at Bennett's apartment the night she died.

episodes.name: Stonewalled
episodes.overview: Sarah and Holder evade the FBI and unearth new evidence. Mitch endangers the boys, prompting Stan to take matters into his own hands. Richmond tries to climb back in the race.

episodes.name: Undertow
episodes.overview: The police are thwarted in their efforts to arrest Bennet. Richmond thinks long and hard about removing himself from the Mayor's race. Mitch and Stan have had it with the police.

episodes.name: I'll Let You Know When I Get There
episodes.overview: Richmond rises in the polls; a surprising individual turns himself in.

episodes.name: Missing
episodes.overview: Sarah and Holder discover more on Rosie, but the investigation gets stalled when they have to set out on a search for Jack.

episodes.name: Beau Soleil
episodes.overview: The police connect Rosie to a suspicious website. Stan faces his demons while Mitch learns secrets she never knew about Rosie.

episodes.name: Orpheus Descending
episodes.overview: The identification of the mysterious Orpheus provides a vital connection to the case. Mitch and Stan reflect on the past while contemplating their family's future.

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: A conflicted homicide detective seeking to leave Seattle and start a new life feels compelled to stay and solve the murder of a teenage girl.

episodes.name: Reflections
episodes.overview: In the aftermath of the shooting at City Hall and Linden's discovery that the photo leading to Councilman Darren Richmond's arrest was forged, Sarah returns to Seattle to investigate a possible cover up and wonders if she can trust her partner.

episodes.name: My Lucky Day
episodes.overview: An ominous discovery is made at the Larsen house while Sarah travels to Tacoma to learn Councilman Richmond's dark secret. Meanwhile, Richmond is forced to come to grips with the fallout from the attack at City Hall.

episodes.name: Numb
episodes.overview: Sarah hunts down Rosie's backpack as Holder falls from grace. Mitch re-emerges while Stan continues to entangle himself with the mob. Richmond faces up to his situation.

episodes.name: Ogi Jun
episodes.overview: Sarah and Holder identify the mystery man with the tattoo while Jamie attempts to enlist Gwen's help and Stan learns his past may have come back to haunt him.

episodes.name: Ghosts of the Past
episodes.overview: Sarah receives a message from the dead that may shed light on the identity of Rosie's killer. Meanwhile, Mitch befriends a young runaway; and Richmond has grave doubts about his future in politics.

episodes.name: Openings
episodes.overview: Sarah zeros in on a Larsen-family secret; Stan comes to grips with some past indiscretions; and Mitch takes in a runaway girl. Meanwhile, the Richmond campaign entertains a surprise visitor.

episodes.name: Keylela
episodes.overview: The investigation refocuses on the casino; Stan has an uneasy face-to-face with Richmond; tension grips the Larsen house.

episodes.name: Off the Reservation
episodes.overview: Holder disappears and a desperate Sarah goes looking for him; Stan decides to take matters into his own hands; and Richmond returns to City Hall.

episodes.name: Sayonara Hiawatha
episodes.overview: Richmond lends support to the investigation; Sarah tries to track down Rosie's key; and Stan deals with his troubled son.

episodes.name: 72 Hours
episodes.overview: Sarah teeters on the edge. Stan attempts to make amends. Richmond receives an unexpected boost in the mayoral race.

episodes.name: Bulldog
episodes.overview: A return to the casino winds up sending Sarah and Holder on the run, while Stan and Richmond face life-altering decisions.

episodes.name: Donnie or Marie
episodes.overview: Sarah and Holder close in on the murderer. Meanwhile, the Richmond campaign preps for the election; and the Larsens seek to get their lives back in order.

episodes.name: What I Know
episodes.overview: Sarah and Holder's investigation comes to a close. Meanwhile, Richmond sets out on a bold new course; and a surprise source helps bring closure to the Larsens.

2.name: Season 2
2.overview: Seattle police detectives Sarah Linden and Stephen Holder continue to track a teenage girl's killer after getting it wrong, with tragic consequences.

episodes.name: The Jungle
episodes.overview: Sarah makes a grim discovery in regards to her past; Holder catches an unsettling case; Seward shows his true colors.

episodes.name: That You Fear the Most
episodes.overview: Sarah makes a grim discovery in regards to her past; Holder catches an unsettling case; Seward shows his true colors.

episodes.name: Seventeen
episodes.overview: Sarah has her own reasons to join the task force; Holder finds a new street informant; Seward strokes an old rivalry.

episodes.name: Head Shots
episodes.overview: The task force shuts down a business; Sarah and Holder unite in their pursuit of "the voice"; Seward is offered motivation to comply with orders.

episodes.name: Scared and Running
episodes.overview: Bullet races to find a victim on the run before someone else does; Seward is discourteous to surprise visitors.

episodes.name: Eminent Domain
episodes.overview: Linden and Holder catch up to the latest victim; Seward faces his past; Bullet struggles with the truth while in the jungle.

episodes.name: Hope Kills
episodes.overview: Holder and Linden get a break in the case; Seward clashes with death; Bullet becomes a protector.

episodes.name: Try
episodes.overview: Sarah goes missing; Bullet makes a choice to save Lyric; a dark secret is learned.

episodes.name: Reckoning
episodes.overview: The hunt for a pornographer leads to a shocking revelation; Holder looks for a scapegoat; Twitch and Lyric find their dream home.

episodes.name: Six Minutes
episodes.overview: Sarah copes with the consequences of past mistakes; Holder wrestles personal demons; Seward is truthful.

episodes.name: From Up Here
episodes.overview: Sarah seeks peace in the case's aftermath; the detectives pick up an unnerving new assignment; Lyric is tempted by her old life; Danette says good-bye.

episodes.name: The Road to Hamelin
episodes.overview: In the Season 3 finale, Sarah risks her life when someone dear to her goes missing; and Holder's past is used against him.

3.name: Season 3
3.overview: Ex-detective Sarah Linden returns to a career she thought she'd left behind when her former partner uncovers a string of murders linked to her past.

episodes.name: Blood in the Water
episodes.overview: While covering up Lt. Skinner's sudden disappearance, Linden and Holder are assigned a new case: the brutal murder of an entire family with ties to a military academy.

episodes.name: Unraveling
episodes.overview: Questioning a neighbor leads to a revelation about one of the murder victims.

episodes.name: The Good Soldier
episodes.overview: Reddick digs deeper as Linden and Holder struggle to keep their investigation from going cold.

episodes.name: Dream Baby Dream
episodes.overview: Linden and Holder focus their investigation on a new suspect, and a tip from an informant leads Reddick to a shocking discovery.

episodes.name: Truth Asunder
episodes.overview: New information about the family murders surfaces. Meanwhile, Holder's loyalty is put to the test.

episodes.name: Eden
episodes.overview: Linden and Holder are confronted with the shocking truth behind the Stansbury murders.

4.name: Season 4
4.overview: Linden and Holder return to probe the brutal murder of a family while confronting their own dark actions in the final season of this crime thriller.
